string-array.name: card_desc
string-array.item: Gebouw R1 heeft onderhoudt, en daarom kan de achteringang niet worden gebruikt.

2MANDATORY EVACUATION FOR ALL RESIDENTS LIVING BELOW LAKE TAHOMA CONTINUES. THIS WAS ISSUED AT THE RECOMMENDATION OF DAM ENGINEERS WHO REMAIN ON THE SCENE. THE CLASS 1 EMERGENCY AT LAKE TAHOMA WILL CONTINUE UNTIL DAM INSPECTORS EVALUATE THE DAM DURING DAYLIGHT HOURS. THIS IS FOR YOUR SAFETY.

3MANDATORY EVACUATION FOR ALL RESIDENTS LIVING BELOW LAKE TAHOMA CONTINUES. THIS WAS ISSUED AT THE RECOMMENDATION OF DAM ENGINEERS WHO REMAIN ON THE SCENE. THE CLASS 1 EMERGENCY AT LAKE TAHOMA WILL CONTINUE UNTIL DAM INSPECTORS EVALUATE THE DAM DURING DAYLIGHT HOURS. THIS IS FOR YOUR SAFETY.
